messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Uh, yeah, man, I'm up in Lex there, and, uh, we were in the road. We saw a guy jump out of a Cadillac.
Okay, he jumped out of the car, and what did he have?
He was tied up.
Do you still see the guy?
No, the Cadillac drove off right after the wreck.
Okay, where is this guy now?
He's right here in Lexington at the Marathon Station.
Has anyone called the police before you?
No, sir.
Is this a white guy or a black guy?
It's a black guy, an older black guy. He just got out of the car, and he was tied up.
And the car, did it go towards Commerce?
Yes, it got on the bypass heading towards Commerce.
Okay, did he jump out of the trunk?
Yes, sir. The trunk was messed up, and he jumped out of it with his hands tied.
Which way did the vehicle go?
Towards Commerce, and the trunk wouldn't shut because he damaged it.
Can you meet with an officer and tell him what you saw, please?
Well, I went back to Hallmark Mobile Park. I'm working and can't leave.
Sir, this sounds like an emergency. Can you please meet with an officer?
All right, but I'm in the car with somebody else now.
Who's in the car with you now?
The guy who jumped out of the trunk. He got into a brown Oldsmobile.
Do you know which way that car went?
Towards the police station.
Do you know if the driver was white or black?
I don't know who was driving the Cadillac initially. I didn't see if the driver was white or black.
How long ago did this happen?
About 10 minutes ago.
Okay, where exactly are you now?
I went back to Hallmark Mobile Park.
Okay, we will send an officer out to meet you there. Can you stay there for a bit?
I'll try, but I'm working.
We appreciate your cooperation. Thank you.
Clark County 911
Hey, how you doing? I would like to report a kidnapping and carjacking. They locked me in the trunk of a car.
Okay, where are you right now?
At the Pitman's Tire Shop across from Carmike.
Can you describe what happened?
I know who did it. My name is Judon Brooks, J-U-D-O-N, Brooks, B-R-O-O-K-S.
Okay, can you tell me what kind of vehicle it was?
It was a 75 Chevrolet convertible cream color.
Where did this happen?
It was right before I got to the tire shop. They put me in the trunk.
Are you safe now?
Yes, my friends were nearby and they helped.
Do you know who the people who did it were?
I know one of them was Jamie Hood.
Are you at Pitman's Tire Shop now?
Yes, but we're heading back there now.
Okay, stay there so an officer can meet you.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hey, there's someone shooting over here on Sycamore Street.
What's the address?
235 Sycamore, Timber Chase.
Can you see anything?
I just saw a guy running. He's a black guy with a white shirt.
Is he wearing blue shorts as well?
Yes, hurry up!
Alright, an officer is on the way.
